pages.text: Magnets are able to pull items and blocks around when clicked. Some config options exist for magnet ranges and allowed materials. Rare earth magnets have a longer range (10) than alnico (5).
A weakly powered natural magnet. Obtained by crushing $(world/ores#magnetite_ore)Magnetite Ore$().
Provide with a redstone signal to attract the closest block towards the magnet face. Range is equal to that of the item version.
